title: Svelte
desc: Svelte is known for its lightweight and efficient approach to building web applications, as well as its intuitive syntax and ability to create reactive components.

title: Tailwind CSS
desc: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that lets you build custom designs quickly and efficiently using pre-designed CSS classes. Result: clean, scalable, maintainable code.

title: Netlify
desc: Netlify is a cloud-based platform that makes it easy to deploy and host modern web applications. It offers continuous deployment, global CDN, and powerful features for building, deploying, and managing your applications.

title: TypeScript
desc: TypeScript is a typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript. It adds optional static typing and class-based object-oriented programming to JavaScript.
